ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |

| 1 |  | #P_xadddi | |- ( ( C e. RR /\ A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* ) -> ( C *e ( A +e B ) ) = ( ( C *e A ) +e ( C *e B ) ) ) |
| 2 | 1 | #P_3coml | |- ( ( A e. RR* /\ B e. RR* /\ C e. RR ) -> ( C *e ( A +e B ) ) = ( ( C *e A ) +e ( C *e B ) ) ) |
